1.0.1.name: wordpress/megaticker
1.0.1.description:
This free plugin created for Internet entrepreneurs who are concerned about the efficiency of the business and want to increase the conversion of landing pages. Optionally, you can create one-time offers, as well as show users the WOW-effect splash, pushing them to the desired action before redirecting.

Increase profit with:

  • limited offers
  • countdown timers on the pages / posts

and, optionally, with:

  • one-time offers
  • drawing attention timers
  • splashes, pushing for immediate action
